name: Car Newbie
description:
A nice free car game, you can play it for free but please if you want me to add more car i will need people who donate money to me so i could add new car and more!

A Note From The Developer.

if(PeopleDonateMoney) then

AddNewCars();

i will add android support soon (;  and i hope you guys will enjoy my game (;

Controls: While in game press Alpha 1 to return to menu or Alpha 2 to return to car selection screen. When in the car selection screen press Alpha 1 to return to menu. And after exit if you want.
